name: I brought the noble girl home
detailed_description:
The future war broke out, and many noble girls were taken away by unknown creatures. You were chosen by your superiors to go on a secret mission to bring these girls back.




Step 1: Click on the girl's profile picture.
Step 2: Select the Start button.
Step 3: Enter the game, mouse operation, automatic attack.



Control the mouse, kill the enemy. Unlock the girl slowly.
Enemies can fire bullets or touch the player to damage the player.
The game ends when the girl is finished or the player dies.



Click the Girls button and select the View button. You can enter appreciation mode.
Click the Zoom in or zoom out button to zoom in and out.
Click and drag the picture to control the position of the picture.
